name: flogo-kafka
title: Publish Kafka message
description: Publish a message to a kafka topic
author: Wendell Nichols <wnichols@tibco.com>

settings.name: brokerUrls
settings.description: The Kafka cluster to connect to

settings.name: topic
settings.description: The Kafka topic on which to place the message

settings.name: user
settings.description: If connection to a SASL enabled port, the userid to use for authentication

settings.name: password
settings.description: If connection to a SASL enabled port, the password to use for authentication

settings.name: truststore
settings.description: If connection to a TLS secured port, the directory containing the certificates representing the trust chain for the connection. This is usually just the CACert used to sign the server's certificate

output.name: partition
output.description: Documents the partition that the message was placed on

output.name: offset
output.description: Documents the offset for the message
